channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenVPN -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenVPN -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-7224|2024-08-02T08:57:35.118Z -- openvpn -- openvpn%20connect
item.description: OpenVPN Connect version 3.0 through 3.4.6 on macOS allows local users to execute code in external third party libraries using the DYLD_INSERT_LIBRARIES environment variable

item.title: CVE-2023-7235|2024-08-02T08:57:35.194Z -- openvpn -- openvpn
item.description: The OpenVPN GUI installer before version 2.6.9 did not set the proper access control restrictions to the installation directory of OpenVPN binaries when using a non-standard installation path, which allows an attacker to replace binaries to run arbitrary executables.

item.title: CVE-2023-6247|2024-08-02T08:21:18.110Z -- openvpn -- openvpn%203%20core%20library
item.description: The PKCS#7 parser in OpenVPN 3 Core Library versions through 3.8.3 did not properly validate the parsed data, which would result in the application crashing.

item.title: CVE-2023-7245|2024-08-02T08:57:35.027Z -- openvpn -- openvpn%20connect
item.description: The nodejs framework in OpenVPN Connect 3.0 through 3.4.3 (Windows)/3.4.7 (macOS) was not properly configured, which allows a local user to execute arbitrary code within the nodejs process context via the ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE environment variable

item.title: CVE-2024-1305|2024-08-01T18:33:25.379Z -- openvpn -- tap-windows6
item.description: tap-windows6 driver version 9.26 and earlier does not properly check the size data of incomming write operations which an attacker can use to overflow memory buffers, resulting in a bug check and potentially arbitrary code execution in kernel space

item.title: CVE-2024-27459|2024-07-23T15:33:01.322Z -- openvpn -- openvpn%20gui
item.description: The interactive service in OpenVPN 2.6.9 and earlier allows an attacker to send data causing a stack overflow which can be used to execute arbitrary code with more privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-1305|2024-07-09T15:12:21.124Z -- openvpn -- tap-windows6
item.description: tap-windows6 driver version 9.26 and earlier does not properly check the size data of incomming write operations which an attacker can use to overflow memory buffers, resulting in a bug check and potentially arbitrary code execution in kernel space

item.title: CVE-2024-28882|2024-07-08T21:30:24.798Z -- openvpn -- openvpn
item.description: OpenVPN 2.6.10 and earlier in a server role accepts multiple exit notifications from authenticated clients which will extend the validity of a closing session

item.title: CVE-2024-27903|2024-07-08T14:32:30.289Z -- openvpn -- openvpn%202
item.description: OpenVPN plug-ins on Windows with OpenVPN 2.6.9 and earlier could be loaded from any directory, which allows an attacker to load an arbitrary plug-in which can be used to interact with the privileged OpenVPN interactive service.

item.title: CVE-2023-7245|2024-02-20T11:08:29.089Z -- openvpn -- openvpn%20connect
item.description: The nodejs framework in OpenVPN Connect 3.0 through 3.4.3 (Windows)/3.4.7 (macOS) was not properly configured, which allows a local user to execute arbitrary code within the nodejs process context via the ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE environment variable

item.title: CVE-2023-7235|2024-02-21T10:55:15.487Z -- openvpn -- openvpn
item.description: The OpenVPN GUI installer before version 2.6.9 did not set the proper access control restrictions to the installation directory of OpenVPN binaries when using a non-standard installation path, which allows an attacker to replace binaries to run arbitrary executables.

item.title: CVE-2023-6247|2024-06-04T17:17:12.958Z -- openvpn -- openvpn%203%20core%20library
item.description: The PKCS#7 parser in OpenVPN 3 Core Library versions through 3.8.3 did not properly validate the parsed data, which would result in the application crashing.

item.title: CVE-2024-24974|2024-07-08T10:22:24.212Z -- openvpn -- openvpn%202
item.description: The interactive service in OpenVPN 2.6.9 and earlier allows the OpenVPN service pipe to be accessed remotely, which allows a remote attacker to interact with the privileged OpenVPN interactive service.

item.title: CVE-2024-27459|2024-07-08T10:14:38.971Z -- openvpn -- openvpn%20gui
item.description: The interactive service in OpenVPN 2.6.9 and earlier allows an attacker to send data causing a stack overflow which can be used to execute arbitrary code with more privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-27903|2024-07-08T10:27:40.125Z -- openvpn -- openvpn%202
item.description: OpenVPN plug-ins on Windows with OpenVPN 2.6.9 and earlier could be loaded from any directory, which allows an attacker to load an arbitrary plug-in which can be used to interact with the privileged OpenVPN interactive service.

item.title: CVE-2024-1305|2024-07-08T17:27:44.097Z -- openvpn -- tap-windows6
item.description: tap-windows6 driver version 9.26 and earlier does not properly check the size data of incomming write operations which an attacker can use to overflow memory buffers, resulting in a bug check and potentially arbitrary code execution in kernel space

item.title: CVE-2024-28882|2024-07-09T12:19:57.631Z -- openvpn -- openvpn
item.description: OpenVPN from 2.6.0 through 2.6.10 in a server role accepts multiple exit notifications from authenticated clients which will extend the validity of a closing session

item.title: CVE-2024-28882|2024-07-10T16:31:37.057Z -- openvpn -- openvpn
item.description: OpenVPN from 2.6.0 through 2.6.10 in a server role accepts multiple exit notifications from authenticated clients which will extend the validity of a closing session

item.title: CVE-2024-24974|2024-07-30T19:15:31.907Z -- openvpn -- openvpn%202
item.description: The interactive service in OpenVPN 2.6.9 and earlier allows the OpenVPN service pipe to be accessed remotely, which allows a remote attacker to interact with the privileged OpenVPN interactive service.

item.title: CVE-2024-28882|2024-08-02T01:03:50.213Z -- openvpn -- openvpn
item.description: OpenVPN from 2.6.0 through 2.6.10 in a server role accepts multiple exit notifications from authenticated clients which will extend the validity of a closing session

item.description: The interactive service in OpenVPN 2.6.9 and earlier allows an attacker to send data causing a stack overflow which can be used to execute arbitrary code with more privileges.

item.description: OpenVPN plug-ins on Windows with OpenVPN 2.6.9 and earlier could be loaded from any directory, which allows an attacker to load an arbitrary plug-in which can be used to interact with the privileged OpenVPN interactive service.
